page.title: 04Attitudes -An Interview.
page.content: Mrs.Carol Bradley moved with her family to Cwmfelin from Birmingham 13 years ago.She has lived in the same house Bradley Stores ever since.A friend reccommended the village as a pleasant place to live.Since then Carol says Cwmfelin has got worse it has become rougher with most children's facilities such as the baths and cinema closed down.Carol said that people have to shop outside the village for their weekly shopping. Trips to the large supermarkets in Newport,Pontllanfraith and Caerphilly have to be done mainly by car as there is only one bus service.Mr.Bradley is a long distance lorry driver and feels Cwmfelin is lacking after travelling to so many different places.The Bradley family car is a Datsun Sunny used for Sunday outings and for getting to work.
